result.arabic_text: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِۖ إِنَّ قُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ كَانَ مَشۡهُودٗا
result.translation: Tsimbataza rero amasengesho akwije ibisabwa guhera ku muhingamo gushika ku mugoroba buhwibiye; wongere utsimbataze isengesho ryo mu mutwenzi, uheze urisomemwo Qor’ani umwanya muremure, mu vy’ukuri isengesho ryo mu mutwenzi, ryitabirwa n’abamalayika b’ijoro hamwe n’abandi babakorera mu ngata ku murango;
